introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is せつび which you will often hear in contexts related to office environments, schools, and industrial plants.
meaning_explanation_english: The word せつび means "equipment" or "facilities." This term is used to refer to tools, machinery, or any other mechanical setup that is used for a specific purpose, often in the context of industries, buildings, or households. It covers a wide range of items, from technological gadgets to kitchen appliances and infrastructure.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of the word せつび is きかい meaning "machine." While せつび refers to a broader category of equipment and facilities, きかい specifically focuses more on machinery and mechanical devices.
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the word せつび is ふそく meaning "insufficiency" or "shortage." While せつび represents the availability of equipment, ふそく implies a lack or deficiency of it.

example_sentences.furigana: 設備(せつび)を装備(そうび)した。

translations.VI: Đã trang bị cơ sở vật chất.
translations.MY: ဆောင်ရွက်မှုကို ပြင်ဆင်ခဲ့သည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 新しい設備が新設されました。
example_sentences.furigana: 新(あたら)しい設備(せつび)が新設(しんせつ)されました。

translations.EN: New equipment has been newly installed.
translations.ID: Peralatan baru telah dipasang baru-baru ini.
translations.ES: Se ha instalado recientemente nuevo equipo.
translations.VI: Thiết bị mới đã được lắp đặt mới.
translations.FR: Un nouvel équipement a été installé récemment.
translations.BN: নতুন সরঞ্জাম সদ্য স্থাপন করা হয়েছে।
translations.ZH: 新的设备已经另外安装好了。
translations.TL: Ang bagong kagamitan ay bagong binuksan.
translations.MY: ကိရိယာအသစ်များကို အသစ်ထည့်သွင်စိန်ခဲ့သည်။
translations.HI: नई मशीनरी हाल ही में स्थापित की गई है।
translations.FA: تجهیزات جدید به تازگی نصب شده است.

example_sentences.kanji: こうしゅうせつびは使いやすいです。
example_sentences.furigana: こうしゅうせつび(こうしゅうせつび)は使(つか)いやすいです。

translations.EN: The public facilities are easy to use.
translations.ES: Las instalaciones públicas son fáciles de usar.
translations.VI: Các cơ sở vật chất công cộng rất dễ sử dụng.
translations.FR: Les installations publiques sont faciles à utiliser.
translations.NE: सार्वजनिक सुविधाहरू प्रयोग गर्न सजिलो छन्।
translations.MY: အများပြည်သူအဆင်စုံ ကလွယ်ကူစွာအသုံးပြုနိုင်သည်။
translations.HI: सार्वजनिक सुविधाएँ उपयोग में आसान हैं।
translations.FA: امکانات عمومی آسان برای استفاده است.

example_sentences.furigana: 設備(せつび)の点検(てんけん)をします。

translations.VI: Tôi sẽ kiểm tra thiết bị.
translations.MY: ဈေးမျိုးစုံစစ်မှုသည် လေးဖြုန်းရန်ဖြစ်သောတွင် ဆင်တော်ဖြစ်ပါသည်။

meanings_translations.MY: ကိရိယာများ
